title: Why are people complaining about Autofill?
body:
if you don't like it don't choose it.





Duh.

replies.body: Can't tell if troll or just stupid

http://i1.kym-cdn.com/photos/images/newsfeed/000/583/040/cff.png

(Let us know if you're serious BTW ahah, I'm sure many would be happy to explain)
I'm serious, can you please explain?

Autofill is not the same as selecting fill. Autofill applies when the queue time is too long/matchmaking can't find a team for your selected roles (which would happen if you picked say mid as first pref and whatever the other popular role is at the time as second pref), at which point matchmaking will autofill you, making your role fill whether you chose it or not.

THe easiest way to avoid autofill is to learn support, or at the very least, to not have sought after roles as both your prefs.

I undertand if you're like "Hey, whenever i choose autofill it really sucks!"


JUST DON'T CHOOSE IT
